com.github.tilastokeskus.matertis.audio.listener

Class AudioListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.tilastokeskus.matertis.audio.listener.AudioListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, LineListener

    public class AudioListener
extends Object
implements LineListener
    Implementation of LineListener. Used to block until line has finished. In the sense of audio, used to wait until an audio clip has finished playing.
    Author:
    tilastokeskus

      • update

        public void update(LineEvent event)

        Stops blocking when a LineEvent with type STOP or CLOSE is received.

        Specified by:
        update in interface LineListener
        Parameters:

      • waitUntilDone

        public void waitUntilDone()
                   throws InterruptedException
        Blocks until this listener is updated with a stop or close event.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - if any thread interrupted the current thread before or while the current thread was waiting for a notification. The interrupted status of the current thread is cleared when this exception is thrown.
